title: Into the Wild NFC West
description:
Mina and ESPN's Lindsey Thiry preview the NFC West- how will the Rams make up for the loss of Cam Akers (1:02)? When is the right time for the 49ers to turn to Trey Lance (18:29)? Can Kliff Kingsbury finally unlock Kyler Murray (34:08)? And will the Seahawks' defense stand up despite a few glaring holes (45:51)?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Omaha Productions, Mina Kimes
